item.title: Factory Physics' Flow Benchmarking in R (with Metamodeling)
item.description: Teaching MBA / MBE classes to seasoned managers is not easy, specially to young lecturers like me. At the same time, itâ€™s necessary to bring new thoughts to the table, and to provide a fundamental basis for experienced people with diverse backgrounds. One of the strategies I found to overcome these obstacles this week was to use a new analysis framework (in my case, Factory Physics concepts) and use that to challenge their views about existing frames they already master (in my case, Lean Manufacturing and Theory of Constraints).
